I was just thinking how fun it would be to have a "Gravity" themed scenario in KSP,. Every 15 minutes or so a wave of debris could come by and you have to get to the space station and then use sepratrons to get to the Chinese station and back to earth. This would be fun. I think even Jeb would be scared Your thoughts?

Edited October 30, 2013 by Lobo1544
Make a mod for it.
I'm well on my way after a ... small mishap ... the other evening.

Kessler Bombs - not my album

I'm working on a better craft.

I'm hoping for that my craft, with one or two launches, could shutdown an ENTIRE celestial body and prevent any further eploration without significant risk of loss and more debris.

On a naval warfare roleplay in KSP, one of my friends has a kethane base that they rely on heavily at Minmus.

Guess which body is first.
That's one way to give Kerbin rings..

That would be cool. That would be wayyyyy more better than my try:

Also I like kessler-bomb crafts.

Extremely awful. You didn't even use the Component space shuttle mod for the Shuttle, and the trailer you made quite frankly is poorly made, nonetheless the whole script can be summarized as "boom boom, fling and burn"

There'a one large thread about this movie, check it out, I've put few Kerbal trailers there. I expect people are going to make lots of them in the future. I would, too, but my computer is a potato, too.
Put some crafts into orbit and see if any debris hits them. Make sure you take pics.

A wave like that is not even possible.

What a pity this movie turned out to be so unrealistic.
When I finish my stock space shuttle, i'm probably going to try this. I've been putting tons of CubeSats in orbit on relatively the same inclination as my station so I can at least get a close call.

I build cubesats IRL. We have to have plans to de-orbit them before we can get launch approval and funding in most cases.

Such collisions are too unlikely to happen every 15 mins. Also I think it will start to get boring after a while, especially to people with multiple spacecraft in orbit. However it is not hard to make something like that happen yourself.
